Let's Work Together
WEL
COME
Hello. I’m a designer who codes. I strive to create simple, original, and impactful user experiences. I take on projects of all sizes; from web design and build, to product and system design. I’ve led the design and creative direction of products, teams, and design systems at a few projects at scholl. I am now a freelance web designer and developer based in Hsinchu. I'm interested in all kinds of problem in terms of tech and willing to discuss. Please do say hello — I look forward to hearing about your project.
